files.patch:
@@ -127,0 +127,8 @@
+  # Libatomic library
+  # 32-bit MIPS needs fallback library for 8-byte atomic ops
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xlinux &&
+      (test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU" = xmips ||
+       test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU" = xmipsel); then
+    BASIC_JVM_LIBS="$BASIC_JVM_LIBS -latomic"
+  fi
+
